shows.title: Consciousness & Archaeology / Remote Viewing Potential
shows.first_half: Researcher Michael Cremo discussed his latest work on consciousness and intriguing discoveries challenging conventional paleontology. Followed by instructor Michelle Freed on the practice and potential of remote viewing.

shows.title: Gemstone Therapy / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Holistic wellness practitioner, clinical hypnotherapist, and gemstone therapist Sydney Songer joins Connie Willis (info) to discuss gemstone energy and why it resonates with the human body, as well as how gemstones can serve as excellent energy medicinal tools. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Connie a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!

shows.title: Medic to Mystic / Bigfoot Investigations
shows.first_half: Academic physician Dr. Anona Blackwell joins Connie Willis (info) for a conversation on how she transformed from a scientifically trained medic into a mystic, acknowledging there is far more to life. She shares her experiences and miraculous cases. Followed by Native American and founder of Bigfoot South Dakota, Chris Barrera, who discusses taking Bigfoot reports and treating them like a crime scene, drawing on his law enforcement and military background.
shows.second_half: 6-10pm PT: Art Bell - Somewhere in Time returns to 1/16/02 when hypnotist Vincent Lords talked about his weird experiences after being buried alive for 12 days.

shows.title: Global Conspiracies / Biblical Disclosures
shows.first_half: First Half: Political strategist and speechwriter Geoffrey Gilson joins Richard Syrett to discuss the netherworld of modern global conspiracies and scandals. He'll expose the connections between Jeffrey Epstein, Prince Andrew, Robert Maxwell, and others, as well as bring us his research on the Russian Mafia, money-laundering through the City of London, and illegal arms-dealing.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Pastor Carl Gallups speaks about what he regards as almost DNA-like encoding from the iconic image of the three crosses on a hill at Golgotha, outside Jerusalem. He'll also share teachings on spiritual warfare and biblical prophecy.

shows.title: Edmund Fitzgerald Sinking / UFO History
shows.first_half: First Half: On November 10th, 1975, the iron ore carrier, the Edmund Fitzgerald sank during a storm on the Great Lakes. There were 29 crew members and no survivors. On this, the 50th anniversary, maritime historian Ric Mixter will share the details and history of this tragedy, as well as his research on why the ship vanished.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Researcher and writer Chris Aubeck will discuss UFOs and the ufologists who have studied them over the decades, including Charles Fort and Kenneth Arnold. He'll also talk about the evolution of the ancient aliens theory, as well as the very first reported UFO sighting.

shows.title: Natural Remedies / Veteran Issues
shows.first_half: First Half: Dr. Drew Peterson will discuss the various ways we can utilize natural remedies to address ailments and health issues, in addition to using modern medicine. Dr. Peterson believes that supplementation and natural remedies are essential for everyday health.
shows.second_half: Second Half: As we honor our country’s military veterans on this Veteran’s Day, we welcome near-death experiencer, veteran’s advocate, and hospice volunteer Dannion Brinkley. He'll speak about the state of the Veterans Administration, the health status of our veterans, and the types of new treatment protocols on the horizon.

shows.title: Profilers & Serial Killers / Celestial Messages
shows.first_half: First Half: Writer Rachel Corbett will present her research on the origins of criminal profiling, tracing its evolution from the 1800s to the present day. She'll share her personal story of her encounter with a murderer as a child, and explain why society remains so fascinated by serial killers such as Ted Bundy, Ed Gein, and Jack the Ripper.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Author and lecturer Catherine Lanigan will bring us the most recent messages for 2025 and 2026 from the angels, ascended masters, and galactic messengers. Amidst the chaotic events and turmoil on earth, she'll share how celestial beings perceive things differently.

shows.title: 3I/ATLAS Anomalies / A Trip to Heaven
shows.first_half: First Half: Professor James McCanney will discuss the interstellar comet 3I/ATLAS. He'll explain its odd behavior, the physics of the 14 anomalous properties that some think indicate alien technology, and the underlying psyops behind the hysteria. He'll also update us on the space race, hydrogen, and more.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Software engineer Steve Boyls will discuss the near-death experience he had while he was on a ventilator in the ICU. He'll reveal his supernatural experience in which an angel took him to heaven, where he saw amazing places, and had what he believes was an encounter with the Almighty.

shows.title: UFO Disclosure / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Steve Bassett is a UFO disclosure activist and the executive director of the Paradigm Research Group. 2025 has been quite the year for ufology, and there is a growing perception that December could be extraordinary in this field. He'll discuss what is expected to come with the ET disclosure, as well as provide an overview of the latest progress that has been made. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give George a call and talk about whatever is on your mind!
